help.description:
Make Trixie announce streamers when they go live.
Supported are Picarto, Piczel, Twitch and Smashcast.
help.usage:
`!alert <page url> <?channel>` - Subscribe Trixie to a streaming channel! *(alias `!alert add`)*
`page url` - copy the url of the stream page and paste it in here
`channel` - optional - the channel to post the alert to later. If omitted will be this channel

`!alert list` - list all active streaming alerts

`!alert remove <page url>` - unsubscribe Trixie from a Picarto channel

`!alert compact` - toggle compact online announcements

`!alert cleanup` - toggle cleaning up online announcements

help.description: Generates ascii art from an image
help.usage:
`!ascii <?url>`
`url` - optional - Url to an image. Or add an attachment to your message

help.description:
Autoban allows admins to make sure to keep specific users out of the server, even if they create a new account.

Glob is an easy to understand text pattern matching solution. Check https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glob_(programming)#Syntax for the info.
Patterns use the RegEx specification. Infos on RegEx can be found here: https://regexr.com/. A good sandbox for RegEx tooling is https://regex101.com/
help.usage:
`!autoban <? userID|username#0000|username>` - view the autoban patterns of this server *(alias `!autoban list`)*
`userID|username#0000|username` - optional - If given, add an autoban configuration

`!autoban id <userID>` - add an autoban config banning the user with this specific, unique userID

`!autoban name <username#0000|username>` - add an autoban config banning the user with this user tag (username#0000) or, if passed a username only, this username (case insensitive)

`!autoban glob <glob>` - add an autoban config banning users matching this glob pattern (always case insensitive)

`!autoban regexp <regexp>` - add an autoban config banning users matching this RegEx pattern (always with i and u flags) *(alias `!autoban regex`)*

**Remove configs:**
`!autoban remove <?thing>` - remove an autoban again. If no args given, returns a numbered list of autobans to choose from

help.description: Trixie's own currency system so you can send, receive, spend, earn credits for additional features or rewards.
help.usage:
`!bank` - Look at your bank account *(alias `!bank show`)*

`!bank create` - Create a bank account to send, receive, spend and earn credits. *(alias `!bank open`)*

`!bank balance` - Check out the balance on your account!

`!bank pay <@user> <cost>` - Pay some other user money
`@user` - Use to pay money to
`cost` - Ammount of money to pay

`!bank transactions` - Display all your transactions from ever! *(alias `!bank trans`)*

`!bank setname <?singular> <?plural>` - Change the name of the currency. If not given any arguments, view the current configuration *(alias `!bank name`)*
`singular` - optional - Sets the singular of the currency name
`plural` - optional - Sets the plural of the currency name. If omitted, singular name will be used for everything

help.description: Random Birb image ovo

help.usage:
`!birthday <YYYY-MM-DD>` - Set your birthday
`YYYY-MM-DD` - optional - Your b-day in Year-Month-Day format

`!birthday reset` - Reset your birthday. Trixie will no longer know it.

`!birthday month <month>` - List all birthdays in this month in the server
`month` - The month as a number. 1 for January, 2 for February, and so on.

**Admin Area:**
`!birthday config` - Configure the automatic birthday role thing in your server

`!birthday config role <role name>` - Set the birthday boy role
`role name` - The birthday role name

`!birthday config toggle` - Toggle the birthday announcer on or off

help.description: Search images on Derpibooru. If used in non-nsfw channels, it will only show safe posts. The bot will automatically filter posts containing content violating Discord's Community Guidelines.
help.usage:
`!derpi` *(alias `!db`)*

`!derpi random <?amount> <query>` *(alias `!derpi`)*
`amount` - optional - number ranging from 1 to 5 for how many results to return
`query` - a query string. Uses Derpibooru's syntax (<https://derpibooru.org/search/syntax>)

`!derpi top <?amount> <query>`

`!derpi latest <?amount> <query>`

`!derpi first <?amount> <query>`

help.description: Disable Trixie from listening to some commands or channels
help.usage:
`!disable`

`!disable channel <#channel>`
`#channel` - A channel or multiple channels

`!disable command <command name>`
`command name` - The name of a command or a space seperated list of commands

Search images on e621. If used in non-nsfw channels, it will only show safe posts. The bot will automatically filter posts containing content violating Discord's Community Guidelines.
help.usage:
`!e621`

`!e621 random <?amount> <query>` *(alias `!e621`)*
`amount` - optional - number ranging from 1 to 5 for how many results to return
`query` - a query string. Uses E621's syntax (<https://e621.net/help/show/tags>)

`!e621 latest <?amount> <query>`

`!e621 top <?amount> <query>`

`!e621 popular <?timerange> <?amount>`
`timerange` - optional - Popular by 'day', 'week' or 'month'. Default: 'week'

help.description: If you have disabled channels or commands for Trixie, you can enable them here again.
help.usage:

`!enable channel <#channel>`

help.description: A whole easy to use role manager. Configure roles everyone can add themselves.
help.usage:
`!role <role> <?user mention 1> <?user mention 2> ...` - to add roles *(alias `!rank`, `!role add`)*
`role` - The role you would like to have added
`user mention` - optional - this is irrelevant to you, if you don't have rights to manage roles yourself

`!role remove <role> <?user mention 1> <?user mention 2> ...` - to remove
`role` - The role you would like to have removed
`user mention` - This is irrelevant to you, if you don't have rights to manage roles yourself

`!role available` - Show all public roles that you can add to yourself.

**Admin Area:**
`!role config` - Configure roles that everyone can add

`!role config add <role> <?category>` - Add a role to the public configuration

`!role config remove <role>` - Remove a role from the public configuration
`role` - The "quoted" role name of the role you want to remove
`category` - optional - The "quoted" name of the category you want to add the role to. Not given will be "Other"

help.description: Trixie's own soundboard! OOF. There are user soundboards and server soundboards. Means every server can have a local soundboard and every user their own soundboard with sound clips as well.
help.usage:
`!sb <?sound name|id>` - Play a soundie of the one's available for you in this server *(alias `!soundboard`)*
`sound name` - optional - sound name to play. If omitted, shows list of all available soundclips
`id` - optional - sound clip id to play instead of sound name

**Manage Your Soundboards:**
`!sb upload <?scope> <sound name>` - Upload a sound clip to Trixie. Attach the audio file to the message when sending *(alias `!sb u`)*
`scope` - optional - `user` or `server`
`sound name` - Name of the new sound clip

`!sb import <?scope> <id>` - Import a soundclip from another user or server to your or your server's soundboard. You can get the ID of a soundclip by asking the owner of the clip you want to import to type `!sb info <sound name>` *(alias `!sb i`)*
`id` - The unique ID of a soundclip

`!sb delete <?scope> <sound name>` - Delete a soundclip from your or your server's soundboard. *(alias `!sb d`)*
`sound name` - The name of the soundclip to delete

`!sb info <?scope> <sound name|id>` - View info about a sound clip and get it's unique ID, for people to be able to play it as well
`sound name` - The name of the sound clip to view more info about
`id` - The id of the sound clip to view more info about instead of sound name

**Buy New Slots:**
`!sb buyslot <?scope>` - Buy additional soundboard slots with Trixie's currency *(alias `!sb b`)*

`time` - timeout length. E.g.: `1h 20m 10s`, `0d 100m 70s` or `0.5h` are valid inputs

`!timeout remove <user mention 1> <user mention 2> ...`

`!timeout clear` - remove all timeouts

`!timeout list` - list all timeouts present at the moment

help.usage:
`!waifu` - Show all waifus you have claimed

`!waifu claim <@mention>` - Claim the person you mentioned if not already claimed.

`!waifu unclaim <@mention>` - Unclaim the person you mentioned if already claimed.

`!waifu steal <@mention>` - Steals a random waifu with a chance of 5%. Cooldown: 5 minutes
`@mention` - The waifu you want to perform actions on

`!waifu escape` - Don't like your new owner or would rather be free? Simply run away! ... with a small 5% chance. Cooldown: 5 minutes
